ygData.subject: Re: an Idea
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard the sound but never found out where the door was or how to make the sound (the button). There is an area near the basement underwater that looks
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard the sound but never found out where the door was or how to make
the sound (the button). There is an area near the basement underwater that
looks like it should be a zone to somewhere. perhaps if someone clicked the
button and someone swam down the tunnel?.... If you try it PLEASE let me
know I am in Permafrost!
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yigman008@...>
To: <EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, January 06, 2000 10:26 PM
Subject: [EQ_Tinkering] an Idea


> I was readin a post, I discounted it as major B.S. but checked it out
> regardless since I was in Ak'anon. It mentioned somethin bout a clockwork
> dragon, now the dragon, I don't believe, not by a longhshot. But it also
> mentioned one of those lamp, star light post things, and when ya click it,
it
> makes a door opening sound and turns 90 degrees. I thought that it was
worth
> 2 seconds investigation, so I found the one that wasn't soinning next to
the
> lake. I clicked it, and sure enough, it turned bout 90 degrees, and I
heard
> the door creak. I have no idea what this is about, knowing my luck, this
> little topic has popped up on the list before, but I'm a recent addition
to
> it. If it has, GOOD! someone please fill me in and quench my curiosity. If
it
> hasn't, anyone have any ideas what it is, cause who knows, what if it has
> valid importance, this is a long shot, but it may have somethin to with
> diamond dust. I know I know, there's a bunch of you thinking I'm prime
full
> of it, but about the little door creak and star lamp thing, I'm not, I
invite
> you to see it yourself. Anyways, I jus thought I'd toss that one out
there.
> If it's been brought up before, forgive me for my insolence.
>
> Yigoron,
> 30 Magician,
> Bristlebane
>
